subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In Super Bowl XLII, the Giants proved that big men win big games, an eye opener that magnified what has become obvious on recent N.F.L. draft days: this is a golden era for offensive tackles.
snippet: In Super Bowl XLII, the Giants proved that big men win big games, an eye opener that magnified what has become obvious on recent N.F.L. draft days: this is a golden era for offensive tackles.
